name: Rogue Tilt
description:
Gamejam game!  Tilt with L- and R-triggers on a controller, attack with X.  

I didn't get to finish this game for the gamejam, so there's approx two levels and then it'll --- end.  :']  But this is a nice base for making other things so I'll probably continue it.

EDIT: This game may only work with controller, it is untested with Keyboard.
